segments.text: IBA , Client Services Department . Shelley speaking , how can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Client Services ? Oh , hello . I need your help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , that's what we're here for . What can I help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a tourist in this city and unfortunately I've lost my card !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Calm down , Sir . Is that an IBA Debit or Credit Card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Credit Card . The International Credit Card , I can't find it anywhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just calm down , Sir . OK , when do you think you lost it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not 100 % sure , around an hour ago I guess . I had it in the hotel lobby bar ; I used it to charge something to my room . I obviously didn't pick it up again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine , Sir . Let me just take some details FRCM you and we can help you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
